description: Explore the intricacies of funding blockchain projects with strategies like ICOs, STOs, and IEOs, along with the significance of token lockups. Understand how to navigate regulatory, market, and security challenges to ensure project stability and long-term growth.
keywords: blockchain funding, ICO, STO, IEO, token lockups, market stability, compliance, regulatory challenges, blockchain project strategies
title: Navigating Blockchain Project Funding and Token Lockups
